commit.message:
Fixing paginated search with PostgreSQL

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1246799 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -165,6 +165,14 @@
         <level value="INFO"/>
         <appender-ref ref="persistence"/>
     </logger>
+    <logger name="org.hibernate.SQL" additivity="false">
+        <level value="OFF"/>
+        <appender-ref ref="persistence"/>
+    </logger>
+    <logger name="org.hibernate.type" additivity="false">
+        <level value="OFF"/>
+        <appender-ref ref="persistence"/>
+    </logger>
 
     <logger name="org.dbunit" additivity="false">
         <level value="INFO"/>
